snippet.title: Induction of the Lung Myofibroblast PDGF Receptor System by Urban Ambient Particles from Mexico City
snippet.description:

...genic response of lung myofibroblasts to pdgf (lindroos and colleagues, am...10 samples, also stimulated macrophages to secrete factor(s) that upregulated pdgf-r a on lung myofibroblasts. direct exposure of myofibroblasts to pm 10 also elicited upregulation...
Published in 1998.

snippet.title: Exposure to Airborne Ultrafine Particles from Cooking in Portuguese Homes
snippet.description:
* Exposure to Airborne Ultrafine Particles from Cooking in Portuguese Homes
J. C. Bordado, J. F. Gomes, P. C. Albuquerque
...cooking was found to be a main source of submicrometer and ultrafine aerosols from gas combustion in stoves. therefore...the cooking events significantly increased from a baseline of 42.7 μm/cm (increased to 72.9 μm/cm due to gas burning) to a maximum of 890.3...
Published in 2012.
